summary: Completed comprehensive testing of textbook store app after main agent fixes. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Admin authentication and dashboard fully functional. Most frontend features working correctly including theme toggle, parent registration, and embeddable form. Minor issues with language toggle and student grade selection in modals.

ui_bugs.issue: Language toggle button found and clickable but does not change text from Spanish to Chinese
ui_bugs.selector: button with globe icon in header

ui_bugs.issue: Grade dropdown options not clickable in add student modal - element visibility issue

passed_tests: Backend APIs (26/26 tests passed - 100% success rate)
Admin login with credentials (admin@libreria.com / admin123) redirects to /admin
Admin dashboard shows correct stats (8 products, 2 low stock alerts)
Admin can access products tab and view all 8 textbooks
Admin add product dialog opens and form fields work correctly
Theme toggle switches between light and dark mode successfully
Parent registration creates new account and redirects to dashboard
Parent dashboard loads with welcome message and student management UI
Add student dialog opens with form fields and grade dropdown
Embeddable form at /embed/orden loads correctly without header/navigation
Embeddable form contains all required fields (contact, student, payment, notes)
Low stock items highlighted correctly (Espa√±ol 2: stock 5, Ciencias 2: stock 8)
Sample data seeding working (8 textbooks with proper grades and subjects)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix language toggle functionality - button is clickable but text does not change to Chinese. Also improve student grade selection in modal dialogs to ensure dropdown options are properly clickable.
